item.title: tinysite
item.description:
Copy and paste this into a browser url. It is an entire (2 page) static site. That’s it!

Also, if you’d like to decode it first to make sure I’m not doing something shady, paste the data (everything after the comma) to this website. You’ll see the html document.

data:text/html;base64,
